org.ireas.mediawiki

Class BasicMediaWikiConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ireas.mediawiki.BasicMediaWikiConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaWikiConfiguration

    public final class BasicMediaWikiConfiguration
extends Object
implements MediaWikiConfiguration
    Configuration object for MediaWiki instances. The values of the configuration must be set in the constructor. The default user agent is "A tool using org.ireas.mediawiki". It is highly recommended to set the user agent to a string identifying the application using this library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicMediaWikiConfiguration()
      Constructs a new configuration using the default values.
      BasicMediaWikiConfiguration(String userAgent)
      Constructs a new configuration using the specified user agent.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getUserAgent()
      Returns the user agent to be used when connecting to the MediaWiki API.
